banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: How to enhance and expand a global brand
videoData.socialTitle: How to enhance and expand a global brand

nodes.whoTheyAre: James Curleigh is the President of the Levi’s brand, where he manages the brand’s strategic direction and execution. Prior to Levi Strauss & Co., James served as the President and CEO of Keen Footwear, Inc. and was president and CEO of Salomon Sports North America. He also established and led the TaylorMade-Adidas golf division in Europe and held various leadership positions in the London office of M&M Mars.

videoData.description: In today's global marketplace, a brand lives beyond the products graced with its logo. James Curleigh shares his experience shepherding a brand beyond its original incarnation, helping Levi's claim not just market but closet share.
videoData.socialDescription: In today's global marketplace, a brand lives beyond the products graced with its logo. James Curleigh shares his experience shepherding a brand beyond its original incarnation, helping Levi's claim not just market but closet share.
